::Obfucious::
    "Eh?  Who's there?  I can't see from behind you."  He ponders what Clash 
said.  "You want to rule the universe?  That sounds interesting.  What is 
your tactical plan?  I mean after you finish off this puny base someone is 
sure to get mad eventually.  What will you do then?"
